title: New: GEMS – Never Age
body:
With their SXSW debut mere days away, Washington D.

C. dream-pop duo **GEMS** have unveiled the B-side to their 7″ single _All I Ever_, released via Turntable Kitchen. With Lindsay’s ever perfect vocals and their uncanny knack for finding a killer hook, _Never Age_ is yet another very exciting step for this fledgling band. Also, did we mention that they’ll be opening up our unofficial SXSW day party on Wednesday? [RSVP](darkparadise.eventbrite.com) here.
